definitions.definition: A layer of stone, concrete, or other hard material supporting the side of an embankment .
An ornamental facing, as on a common masonry wall, of marble, face brick, tiles, etc.
An armoured building that provides protection against bombs.

main_definition: A layer of stone, concrete, or other hard material supporting the side of an embankment .
secondary_definitions: An ornamental facing, as on a common masonry wall, of marble, face brick, tiles, etc.
An armoured building that provides protection against bombs.
